name: Etherym Guiding Light
text: If this card is in your hand, you can banish this card; add 1 "Etherym" Spell/Trap card or 1 "Rift Eternal" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is Summoned you can add 1 "Etherym" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Etherym Guiding Light". You can only use each effect of "Etherym Guiding Light" once per turn.
